Thanks Gordon, so that would read Bue Ju or as you have Bu E Ju Kunimasa ?. Short hand on mei, interesting concept.

Rich

  From: Gordon Robson 
  To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com

  Subject: RE: [nihontostudy] mei translation


  Hi Rich,



  Rather than Bumu, I think Bu E ju or Bushu Edo ju using a shorthand. Date is
  correct.



  Gordon
